The silky perlage and fresh acidity give it weightless balance. KERIN O’KEEFE

Fragrant and fresh, this sleek red offers inviting aromas of rose, wild berry, botanical herb and a whiff of tilled soil. The bright savory palate evokes juicy red cherry, ripe pomegranate, star anise and orange zest accompanied by present but polished tannins. It closes on a flinty mineral note. KERIN O’KEEFE

Aromas of brioche, acacia honey and chamomile shape the nose. The silky elegant palate shows depth and complexity, delivering white peach, tangerine bread crust, bitter almond and vanilla. Bright acidity lifts the bone-dry finish while the creamy perlage lends finesse. KERIN O’KEEFE

Elegantly structured, this vibrant wine opens with aromas of underbrush, rose petal, red woodland berry and a whiff of new leather. The graceful palate boasts great energy and is delicately delicious, delivering juicy red cherry, pomegranate, star anise and white pepper. Polished tannins show some grip on the lingering finish. Drink 2020–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE

Vibrant and loaded with finesse, this compelling sparkler offers enticing scents of yellow spring flower, citrus and pastry dough. The pristine precise palate delivers yellow apple, lemon, brioche and mineral alongside tangy acidity and a silky perlage. It has a crisp, bone-dry finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
column3: Antica Fratta 2014 Essence Nature Dosaggio Zero (Franciacorta)

column1: Enticingly fragrant, this offers aromas of rose petal, citrus chamomile and a whiff of brioche. Savory and precise, the vibrant palate delivers strawberry, pomegranate, bread crust and mineral alongside racy acidity and silky perlage. The dry crisp finish closes on a hazelnut note. KERIN O’KEEFE

Smooth and creamy, this has delicate aromas of pastry dough, citrus and white stone fruit. The polished palate delivers Bartlett pear, yellow apple, orange zest and a hint of ginger alongside a foaming, refined mousse and bright acidity. KERIN O’KEEFE
column3: Ca' del Bosco 2014 Vintage Collection Brut (Franciacorta)

column1: Citrus zest, crushed herb, pastry dough and wild herb aromas follow over to the vibrant palate along with lemon, yellow apple and a hint of vanilla. Racy acidity gives it freshness and tension while the silky perlage lends softness and elegance. KERIN O’KEEFE
column3: Ca' del Bosco 2014 Vintage Collection Satèn (Franciacorta)

column1: A blend of Pinot Nero and Nerello Mascalese, this savory, stunning sparkler boasts aromas of Spanish broom, bread crust and wild berry. The racy elegant palate presents strawberry, pomegranate, nectarine, citrus and a sprinkling of baking spice. Tangy acidity and a silky mousse provide balance and finesse. KERIN O’KEEFE
column3: Terrazze dell'Etna 2014 Metodo Classico Brut Rosé (Vino Spumante)

column1: Aromas of smoke, bread crust, yellow flower and crushed rock lift out of the glass. On the vibrant, savory palate, fresh acidity lifts yellow peach, pastry dough and lemon cream alongside an elegant perlage. A savory mineral note lingers on the finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
column3: Sandro de Bruno NV 36 Mesi (Lessini Durello)

column1: Bread crust, mature orchard fruit, Spanish broom and acacia honey aromas follow over to the elegant mature palate along with creamy yellow apple, lemon zest and toasted almond. It boasts the complexity of an aged sparkler while youthfully fresh acidity lends energy and freshness. A soft mousse lends finesse. KERIN O’KEEFE

Smooth, savory and stunning, this lovely sparkler has delicately enticing aromas of yellow pear, spring flower, toasted brioche, crushed stone and citrus zest. The silky palate delivers Golden Delicious apple, ripe apricot, almond and a honeyed mineral note. An elegant mousse softens the bone-dry finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
